mapper.select: SELECT T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_IDX , T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_NAME , T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_PHONE , T_COLLEGE.USE_YN , T_COLLEGE.DELETE_YN , T_COLLEGE.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_COLLEGE.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_COLLEGE.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_COLLEGE.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_COLLEGE.CREATE_DATETIME , T_COLLEGE.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME FROM TB_COLLEGE AS T_COLLEGE LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_COLLEGE.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_COLLEGE.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_COLLEGE.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_COLLEGE.COLLEGE_IDX = #{collegeIdx} LIMIT 1
